response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business in ways that are unparalleled. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,250,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its true worth and provides you with an exceptional return on investment.

I understand that making such a decision requires careful consideration, so please take the time to evaluate the offer thoughtfully. If you find this proposal appealing, I am more than happy to discuss further details and address any questions or concerns you might have. I am confident that together we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
